'Tis the only thing outside the fist of the Fury Herself that'll penetrate the dragon's stone hide.<tab>There's only one problem─if this is aught like every other battle with Svara, the dragon'll have its very own horde of foot soldiers in tow, and my men aren't trained or equipped to deal with the lot of them. Might I ask that you join me for the march to the Vigil?<tab>Protect the engineer?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
凶悪なドラゴン族、黄竜「スヴァラ」を知ってるか？
そいつが今、「スチールヴィジル」方面に向かっていると、
アドネール占星台の観測で判明したんだ。<tab>俺たち工作兵は一刻も早く、
奴らを迎撃するため、対竜カノン砲を設置しなきゃならん。<tab>だが、奴らの眷属による妨害が予想される……。
冒険者よ、あんたの力で設置作業が終わるまで、
俺たち工作兵部隊を守ってくれないか！？<tab>護衛を引き受けますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
The gigas! They're everywhere and they won't. Stop. Smashing. Our. Things!<tab>We were on our way back to Ishgard to share this moon's findings with the Holy See when from out of nowhere a band of scantily clad muscle-bound thugs appeared waving their massive weapons, running hither and thither, crushing crates left and right.<tab>It was all my companions and I could do to steal away to safety with whatever we could carry. We are too tuckered to attempt to garrote them by ourselves, and would be more than grateful to <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> who might assist us in driving off the gigas.<tab>Garrote the gigas?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><sigh> A whole moon's findings... Gone... The Sons will be devastated...<tab>
target:
実はギガースがこの地を狙ってましてね～。
何度か追い返したりしてたんですが、
今度はここへの物資を狙いだしたんですよ～。<tab>運悪く、この物資を輸送中に我々も襲われまして～。
なんとかここまでたどり着きましたが
物資を狙ってまた襲ってくるんだろうな～と。<tab>護衛の彼らも、道中の戦闘で疲労してましてね～。
誰かなんとかしてくれないかな～、なんて。<tab>手を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>ですよね～。
そんな奇特な方そうそういるもんじゃ
ないですよね～。<tab>

source: Water collected from the Weeping Saint─or Daniffen's Tears as it is more commonly referred to─is used by the church in myriad holy rites.<tab>'Tis my business to bottle the water and deliver it to the Holy See. That is...'tis my business to do so when the spring is not teeming with angry water sprites. I can offer a small stipend to any soul brave enough to push their way past the sprites and fill these here phials with tears.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
イシュガルドにおいて、この「聖ダナフェンの落涙」は、
「聖水」の湧く聖なる泉として知られています。<tab>私も「聖水」を求めてやってきたのですが、
突然、危険なウォータースプライトが沸いてしまって……
どうか私の代わりに、「聖水」を集めてくれませんか？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Have you collected any tears?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Yes! This is very good, but my client will not be satisfied with any less than what was promised. If you can bring more, I will purchase it off you as I did this delivery.<tab><tab>Have you come for the tears as well? Many pilgrims trace the steps of Saint Daniffen's journey through Coerthas to this place─the place where he met his end at the hands of the Betrayer. But I needn't tell you that if it is true you are a pilgrim yourself.<tab>
target:
あの、「聖水」を持ってきてくれたのでしょうか？<tab><tab><tab><tab>そ……そうです、これです！
ああ、これがもっとあれば、助かるのですが……。<tab><tab>そうですか……あの、冒険者の方？
もしかして、あなたも「聖水」を求めて、
ここまでいらっしゃったとかなのでしょうか？<tab>

source: I believe I have more than enough now for my client, but I will not avert my eyes from opportunity when she is staring me right in the face. The Holy See is a big place. I'm certain I can locate a cardinal or bishop who is in need of my services.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
これだけあれば、式典で注文された量には事足ります。
とはいえ、予備もいくらかは必要ですので……
まだ「聖水」をお持ちなら、ぜひ私にお譲りください。
<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I believe I have more than enough now for my client, but I will not avert my eyes from opportunity when she is staring me right in the face. The Holy See is a big place. I'm certain I can locate a cardinal or bishop who is in need of my services.<tab><tab><tab><tab>Yes, I believe I already have a prospective buyer in mind. Many thanks, adventurer. May the Fury give you strength.<tab><tab>Have you come for the tears as well? Many pilgrims trace the steps of Saint Daniffen's journey through Coerthas to this place─the place where he met his end at the hands of the Betrayer. But I needn't tell you that if it is true you are a pilgrim yourself.<tab>
target:
すでに「聖水」は必要量集まったのですが、
何があるかわかりませんし、余分に用意したいのです。
まだ「聖水」をお持ちでしたら、いただきますよ？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ありがとうございます。
あなたは、かような善行を為される方です。
必ずや神のご加護がありますよ。<tab><tab>そうですか……。
あの、もしかして……あなたご自身も、
式典に「聖水」を持っていかれるおつもりなのですか？<tab>

source:
Like a knight in shining armor, from a long time ago, you have ridden forth from the blue mists on your gallant steed; come to help a poor man crippled by his inane inability to help himself!<tab>Oh, I apologize. My colleagues tell me I have a tendency to wax dramaturgical when it comes to asking someone for their aid. I am but a humble draughtsman, toiling in this terrible place to hammer out a meager existence for me and my wretched wife.<tab>Oh, there I go again. Alright, here's the rub─we at the processing plant require earth cores to maintain the stability of the raw ceruleum piped in from the mines. As we are but mere engineers, we must look to adventurers to obtain those cores. So, what say you?<tab>Slay earth sprites for their cores?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Huzzah! You have my undying thanks, friend!<tab><tab>Oh, woe betide the young man who merely wallowed in a mire of his own sorrow as he watched his knight saunter slowly off into the setting sun!<tab>
target:
そこの冒険者の人、力を貸してもらえないかな？
自分、ここの青燐精製所の技師なんだけど……
あんたみたいな冒険者サンに、頼みたいことあんのさ。<tab>ここでやってる青燐水の精製には触媒として、
「アーススプライトの核」を使用しているんだけどね……
あいにく、うっかりと在庫を切らしちゃった。<tab>それで周辺の「アーススプライト」から調達できんかと、
思ってみたりもしたんだが……自分、戦闘はからっきしで。
冒険者サン、自分の代わりに集めてくれないかな？<tab>力を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>力を貸してくれるんかい！？
いやぁ、助かる助かる、あーりがとぉー！
「アーススプライトの核」、よろしく頼むよ！<tab><tab>んむっ……そっかぁ、わかった。
無理には頼まないよ、他の人を当たってみるさ。<tab>

source: Earth cores can ofttimes be found lying about Bluefog─the final remnants of some long-dead sprite. However, if we were to wait for enough sprites to perish of natural causes before collecting their cores, we would both be old and grey before obtaining a sufficient amount to work with. No, the quickest way to the cores is by taking them from the live sprites.<tab>The cores you collect will be used to fortify the foundations of the processing plant and suppress any vibrations that may come from the nearby fighting─vibrations that could cause an unstable piece of raw ceruleum to ignite, and bring the entire mountain crashing down upon us.<tab>But enough of the chitchat. I shall be waiting here for your triumphant return.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
頼んだのは「アーススプライトの核」だ。
青燐水を精製するとき、触媒に使うシロモノでね。
よろしく頼むよ、冒険者サン。<tab>「アーススプライトの核」は、
近くにいる「アーススプライト」を倒しても手に入るし、
落ちてるのを集めてくれてもいい、どっちも一緒のもんだ。<tab>ともかく、数がいるんだよ。
たっくさん頼むぜ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Well then, have you found any cores yet?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Huzzah, huzzah! 'Twas fate that brought us together. 'Twas cores that strengthened our bonds! 'Tis <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> cores that will <var 1A 02 /var>further<var 1A 01 /var> strengthen our bonds!<tab><tab>You would not think of keeping those cores for yourself now, would you? What good is an earth core to an adventurer other than to sell and line <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> pockets with gil?<tab>
target:
どうしたい冒険者サン、
「アーススプライトの核」を持ってきてくれたんかい？<tab><tab><tab><tab>そうそう、これだよこれ！
この「アーススプライトの核」が必要だったのさ。
んじゃ、まだまだ要るんで、どんどん持ってきてくれな！<tab><tab>いいかい冒険者サン、「アーススプライトの核」だ。
こいつを自分のところまで、バンバン持ってきてくれっ！<tab>

source:
Pardon me, but might you be headed north towards Camp Dragonhead? If you are, I have a proposition.<tab>I am an astrologian employed at the Observatorium. I must hurry these readings to a courier in the camp so that he might deliver them to the archbishop.<tab>Usually, a knight of House Durendaire would accompany me, but those stationed at the Observatorium had to make for the Nail to intercept a band of crazed giants come down from the mountain to raid our kitchens and steal our women. And therefore, I must ask you to accompany me.<tab>Escort the astrologian to Camp Dragonhead?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>I might have expected as much from an unbeliever. The Holy See is wise to keep its gates shut to the likes of you.<tab>
target:
そこの冒険者さん。
もしかして「キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッド」まで
向かうとかだったりしませんか？<tab>実は北の「キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッド」まで
星読みの結果を至急伝える必要がありまして……。
星読みの結果ですか？それは極秘事項で……。<tab>普段であればお付きのものが同行してくれるのですが、
急なことでみな出払っていて…。
道中私の身をお守り頂けないでしょうか。<tab>護衛してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>分かりました。
残念ですが仕方ありません。
どうしよう、早く伝えないと……。<tab>

source:
Out of all the places in this wide realm where you could be standing right now, praise the Wanderer for leading you here to me!<tab>Let us just say that a few too many sips from the wineskin have left me...displaced from my companions, and now I find myself stranded here at the crossroads of nowhere and no place.<tab>And as if it couldn't get any better for a poor man with a pea-sized bladder, I am now being stalked by what appears to be a pack of raptors, of all things. Would it be too much to ask for an escort to someplace less hostile?<tab>Escort the merchant?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Your kindness will not go unrewarded, friend. I am a man of means, and I mean to reward you...once I am safe again with my caravan, I mean.<tab><tab>O fickle goddess of fate, Nymeia! Why must You always pull away that which Oschon has so generously pushed into my path?<tab>
target:
おお、この運命の出会いに感謝します。
つり橋におびえて逃げ出したこの子を追いかけて、
そのまま道に迷ってしまいました。<tab>商隊と合流したいのですが
この子が、魔物の気配にすっかり怖じ気付いて
動いてくれないのです。<tab>この子が、動き出すまで、
しばらくそばにいてくれないか？<tab>いてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>おお、あなたをつかわされた運命の神に感謝を！<tab><tab>おお、運命の出会いではなかったのですね……。<tab>

source:
Jijiroon likes big eggs. Jijiroon likes small eggs. Jijiroon likes round eggs. Jijiroon likes square eggs. Jijiroon's not seen a square egg. Has adventurer seen a square egg?<tab>No? Has adventurer seen a pelican egg? Pelican eggs are big eggs. Pelican eggs are round eggs. Big round tasty eggs are pelican eggs.<tab>Jijiroon likes pelican eggs. Qiqirn like pelican eggs. Qiqirn trade sparklies for pelican eggs. Jijiroon trades sparklies for pelican eggs and then trades pelican eggs for more sparklies!<tab>Trade pelican eggs with Jijiroon for sparklies?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Jijiroon's clever Qiqirn! Clever, clever Qiqirn!<tab><tab>No eggs, no sparklies... No sparklies, no eggs... No eggs, no supper...<tab>
target:
ジジルン、タマゴ、スキスキっちゃ！
キキルンみんな、タマゴ、スキスキっちゃ！<tab>ジジルン、タマゴ、ないないっちゃ！
ジジルン、タマゴ、あつめるっちゃ！<tab>あっちに、ペリカン、いるいるっちゃ。
あなた、「ペリカンの卵」、とるとるっちゃ！<tab>「ペリカンの卵」をとってきてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>ジジルン、わくわくっちゃ……
タマゴ、わくわくっちゃ……<tab><tab>ジジルン、しょんぼりっちゃ……
タマゴ、たべたいっちゃ……<tab>

source: Adventurer has eggs for Jijiroon?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Oh ho! Jijiroon must keep paws from oh, so tasty eggs. Tasty eggs mean sparkly sparklies. Jijiroon loves his sparklies!<tab><tab>Greedy adventurer hoards tasty eggs for greedy self! Might Jijiroon's sparklies have not enough sparkle?<tab>
target:
「ペリカンの卵」、あるあるっちゃ？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ジジルン、うきうきっちゃ。
もっともっと、くれくれっちゃ！<tab><tab>「ペリカンの卵」、もっともっと、くれくれっちゃ！<tab>

source: More eggs, more sparklies! No eggs, no sparklies!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: 「ペリカンの卵」、くれくれっちゃ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Enough eggs, enough sparklies... More eggs, <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> sparklies!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
「ペリカンの卵」、もりもりっちゃ！
これで、ちゃりちゃり、もりもりっちゃ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Adventurer has more eggs for Jijiroon? More eggs means more sparklies! Or maybe...Jijiroon eats more tasty eggs!<tab><tab><tab><tab>Oh ho! Jijiroon cannot keep paws from oh, so tasty eggs. Tasty eggs are oh, so tasty. Jijiroon has enough sparklies. Jijiroon cannot eat sparklies! Jijiroon <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> eat tasty eggs!<tab><tab>Greedy adventurer hoards tasty eggs for greedy self! Might Jijiroon's sparklies have not enough sparkle?<tab>
target:
「ペリカンの卵」、もりもり、うれしいっちゃ！
もっともりもり、ほしいっちゃ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>ジジルン、ルンルンっちゃ。
もっともりもり、くれくれっちゃ！<tab><tab>ジジルン、ワクワクっちゃ。
タマゴ、もりもり、ワクワクっちゃ！<tab>

source:
Why must I have such ill luck? I <var 1A 02 /var>finally<var 1A 01 /var> meet a good man─tall, handsome, caring─and invite him out for a romantic afternoon on Hopeseed Pond, just the two of us, casting our lines into the calm water as we listen to the forest whisper.<tab>But what happens on the path home? What <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> happens! We're attacked by a pack of lindwurms! And of course, the gentleman he is, my love sacrifices himself to the creatures that I might escape unscathed. And so here I sit, twenty summers gone since my first nameday, and still without husband.<tab>Oh, and I almost forgot. The lindwurms have finished devouring my soulmate and now they are after me. Perhaps I should just sit here and allow them to ravage my flesh... Is there no one who will come to my rescue?<tab>Help the damsel in distress?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>I am coming, Gerard...or was it Gerald. No, Gerald was last week...though, I suppose he'll be there, too.<tab>
target:
ああっ、助けて冒険者さんっ！
お願いします、他に頼れる人いないんですぅっ！<tab>森で働いていたら、「リンドヴルム」に襲われたんです！
慌てて、何とかここまで逃げてきたんですけど……
しつこくて、まだ追うのを諦めてません！<tab>お願いします、冒険者さん！
あの恐ろしい「リンドヴルム」を退治してください！<tab>退治しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そ、そんな……。
こんな残酷なことがあっていいの……！？<tab>

source:
Ah, visiting one! This one is Phanaxio of the New Leaf. This one seeks aid from one who seeks to give it.<tab>This one stands in a sad, sad place, soaked with the blood of many friendly ones. This one's companions were slain by touched ones for refusing to bend to their dark design.<tab>This one only wishes to gather fallen ones' belongings, so that fallen ones may be returned to a place more proper than this. Would spoken one who stands here now hear this one's humble entreaty?<tab>Collect the effects of the fallen sylphs?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>This one is gladdened at spoken one's response. This one shall wait here for the items.<tab><tab>This one is saddened by spoken one's response, but understands that it cannot be helped. This one will endure...<tab>
target:
あなた、誰でふっち？
もちかちて、手伝ってくれるのでふっち？<tab>ここでなかまがたくさん死んでた、悲ちい場所でふっち。
ここには、たいせつななかまのもちものが落ちてるふっち。
なかまのもちもの、集めてあげたいでふっち。<tab>お願いでふっち、
なかまの思いでの持ち物、あつめてほちいんでふっち！<tab>シルフの遺品を集めますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>ありがとふっち、助かるふっち。
でも、わるいシルフもきてるふっち。
気をつけるでふっち。<tab><tab>ううっ、ちもなみだもないでふっち。
あなたなんかキライでふっち、かえれかえれでふっち！<tab>

source: Has spoken one found the effects of fallen brave ones?<tab><tab><tab><tab>This one cannot express the feelings that well in this one's heart. Yet, the search is not over. There are still more items to be found.<tab><tab>Then this one shall wait.<tab>
target:
なかまのもちもの、持ってきたでふっち？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ありがとふっち。
もっとお願いするでふっち。<tab><tab>ものがないでふっち？<tab>

source: The effects of this one's fallen companions must be gathered if fallen ones' memories are to endure. Here this one shall wait until all have been found.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
なかまのもの、集めてるでふっち。
見つけたら持ってくるでふっち。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: This one is filled with sorrow for the loss of close companions, but the return of these keepsakes will ensure fallen ones' memories endure for all time.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
いっぱい集まって、うれちいでふっち。
でも、もっとあったら、ほしいでふっち。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Has spoken one found further effects of fallen brave ones?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Spoken one is more resourceful than this one could have ever imagined. Further thanks are in order.<tab><tab>Then this one shall make ready to take the items on one final journey.<tab>
target:
まだあるのでふっち？
あるなら、もらってあげたいでふっち。<tab><tab><tab><tab>ありがとふっち。
たくさんたくさん、あるほうがいいふっち。<tab><tab>そうでふっち？
ないなら、なくてもいいでふっち。<tab>

source:
What is all the fuss, you ask? Why, it is this...this...<var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>, that is what. Though forbidden entry to the springs, he insists on returning each and every day to disturb our other customers.<tab>Oh, but it is not what you think. We haven't banned him for what he <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var>, but for what he has <var 1A 02 /var>done<var 1A 01 /var>─namely exposing himself to several of the other bathers.<tab>It is my duty to escort him off the premises, but just look at the size of him! Without several extra helping hands, I fear that this will not end well for me or the springs. Might you lend me your blade?<tab>Drive the debaucher from the springs?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Well, then wish me the Spinner's luck, because I will most definitely need it... Ulp!<tab>
target:
ん、何を揉めてるかって？
実は彼、ここを出禁になっててねぇ。
お引き取り願おうとしているのさ。<tab>マムージャ族の湯浴みの踊りが卑猥だと、
ほかの客から苦情が殺到してるもんで、
やめるよう頼んでるんだが、聞いてくれなくてね……。<tab>もはや、腕ずくで止めるしかない状況さ。
よければ、あんたも手を貸してくれないか？<tab>手を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうか……
マムージャ族は、うでっぷしが強いから
不安だが、自分でやるしかないか……<tab>

source:
Tell me, did you happen to see a pair of double-crossing snakes on your way here? No, I suppose you did not. But that is no longer of any matter. What matters is the opportunity that sits here before each of us. That is, unless you are a double-crossing snake as well.<tab>Look around. What do you see? Does this look like any place for an unarmed merchant? No it does not. Then what, you ask, am I doing here? I'd like to know the answer myself! One moment I was on my way to discuss business at the Ceruleum Processing Plant, flanked by a pair of burly Hellsguards, the next I'm all by my lonesome.<tab>Yes, perhaps there was talk of me halving their pay on account of their not having slain a single beast since that ladybug outside Stonesthrow...but that is beside the point! They could have at least waited until we had arrived at the plant and I had paid them their half before leaving me. And now, here I am, short one escort...<tab>Accompany the merchant to the plant?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>But I'll pay you with the money I promised the others! Is that not enough incentive!?<tab>
target:
ちょいとそこ行く冒険者の人！
あたしの話を聞いちゃくれませんかね？<tab>実はこれから青燐精製所まで、
商談をまとめに赴かなければならないんですが……。<tab>最近イロイロと物騒でしょ？
ひとりで行くのが不安だから、ご一緒してもらえないか、
なーんて思いまして……どうでしょうかね？<tab>一緒に行きますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>なんだ、冷やかしですか。
だったら……帰ってくれませんかね？<tab>

source:
A scout has just returned bearing ill tidings. A party of Amalj'aa and their tempered slaves have begun a summoning rite nearby. Do you know what that means, fool? Ifrit! The hells-damned primal could be here breathing fire down our necks any moment!<tab>While I do not doubt my unit would fight bravely if it came to battle with the Lord of the Inferno, I fear we would be overmatched and their deaths would be for naught. However, those Amalj'aa who conduct the rites, they we may be able to handle.<tab>With some help...of course. If we can engage the lizards and the tempered and distract them long enough to destroy the glowing cresset used in the rites, we may be able to thwart their plans and drive them back to Zahar'ak. Will you join us?<tab>Aid the recruit?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Then we shall do the deed without you. Such is our duty, such is our destiny.<tab>
target:
冒険者さん、力を貸してください！
この地で蛮神イフリートのテンパードたちが、
蛮神を崇め奉る儀式をしようとしているようなんです！<tab>これ以上、蛮神イフリートに力をつけられては、
我らが不滅隊にとってよい結果は生まれないでしょう……。<tab>奴らが儀式に使っている祭器があるはずです。
儀式を仕切るアマルジャ族の祭司・警備兵ともども、
この地より排除してはもらえないでしょうか！？<tab>手を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうですか……申し訳ない、無理を言いました。
確かに、これだけの敵を相手することは簡単ではない……
勝算なき戦を、軽々にできるはずありませんよね。<tab>

source: We must stop the summoning rites at once!<tab>The only way to do so is to locate the glowing cresset used in the dark ceremony, and the quickest way to locate it is by gutting the Amalj'aa who devise to use the unholy vessel.<tab>But keep your eyes open for the tempered. Despite their outward appearances, they are no longer like us. They have been ripped of their souls and will throw themselves on a blade without hesitation if it means to protect their fiery masters. Deal with them, but only if you must.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
アマルジャ族のテンパードたちが行っている、
蛮神イフリートを崇め奉る儀式を止めてください！<tab>儀式を取り仕切っている、
アマルジャ族の祭司と警備兵を倒すんです。
そうすれば、奴らの祭器が見つかるはず……！<tab>周りのテンパードたちの抵抗もあるでしょうが、
全てをこの地より排除してください！
くれぐれも、お気をつけて！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
An adventurer! And just in the nick of time! Can you lend a man a hand?<tab>The cart with today's shipment of sour red was overturned just as she left from Wineport. If it were simply restacking crates, I wouldn't bother asking an outsider for help, but my boy who rode ahead to corral the bolted cart birds spotted a band of buccaneers headed this direction.<tab>I haven't the means to defend meself or the crates, and the Wineport militia is too drunk to be of any help. So I must put the fate of my cargo in your hands.<tab>Protect the wine from the buccaneers?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Then I'll be forced to abandon my wine...and my livelihood... Forgive me, son...<tab>
target:
おお、なんてたくましそうな冒険者さんだ。
ひとつ、その素敵な腕を貸してくれませんか？<tab>荷馬車が、積荷のワインを落としているのに気づかず
さっさと行ってしまったんです。<tab>上等なワインですので、拾い集めて、
ワインポートへ運びたいんですが……
私の細腕じゃ、とてもとても運べそうにないもので……<tab>運んであげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そ、そんな……。
こんなことなら、普段から鍛えておけばよかった……。<tab>

source: Fortune may be a fickle mistress, but today she chose to smile upon a lone draughtsman, and for that I thank her...and thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> as well.<tab>Now I must gather my things and ready myself for the short, but sweet journey back to the plant. Though, if you happen to find any more cores in the time before I depart, I will be more than happy to purchase those off you.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
いやぁ、助かるよ！
冒険者サンのおかげで、いっぱい集まったさ。<tab>だが、出し惜しみはやめといてくれるかな？
まだ持ってるなら受け取るから、自分によこしてくれよ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What is this? Has my knight wrenched more cores from the cold, dead corpses of our friendly neighborhood sprites?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Huzzah, huzzah! I knew from the moment I saw you that you were not one to let a man down. A tip of my hat to you...had I a hat to tip.<tab><tab>Hoarding cores will do you little good. There are only a handful of people in the realm who seek them, and I guarantee you none are as kind...or rich as I.<tab>
target:
おっと……もしかして冒険者サン、
「アーススプライトの核」を持ってきてくれたのかい？<tab><tab><tab><tab>そうだよ、これさ！　これが欲しかったのさ！
もっともっと、持ってきてくれよな！<tab><tab>まだあるのかい？
あるなら、早めに持ってきてくれよ。
俺がこの場を去ってしまう前にさ。<tab>

source:
Shhh! Quiet down! Any louder and you will compromise my position to the enemy! Over there. Can you not see the small party of imperial troops? Their purpose, and how they made it this deep into the Twelveswood without being discovered─that is what I was here to find out...that is, until the tempered sylphs arrived.<tab>Now the two groups are fighting, and more sylphs gather as we speak. The tempered followers of Ramuh are not what one would call friends of Gridania, but we may be able to use this situation to our advantage.<tab>Allow the beastmen and the imperials to weaken each other just enough, and then swoop in and put the Garlean invaders to the sword, frightening off any sylphs who remain.<tab>See Mianne's far-fetched plan into motion?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Think about it! If this works, I'll be awarded the Emerald Leaf! Oh, and, uh...you might be awarded something, too.<tab><tab>Then begone with you. I won't be dragged off for tempering because you couldn't keep quiet.<tab>
target:
シーッ！
今は偵察任務中だ、大きな声を出すなよ冒険者……。
ここがバレたら、命はないぜ……？<tab>いいか、ここには帝国の先遣部隊がいる。
奴らめ、どうやってここまで入ってきたかしらんが……
何を企んでるか、ここでこうして探っているのさ。<tab>……だが、ここに近々テンパードシルフがくるらしいんだ。
あいつらが、帝国兵とぶつかったら大騒ぎになる……。
先に帝国兵を撃破して、全面対決を避けるんだ！<tab>協力しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>やってくれるか！
すまない、恩に着るぜ……。<tab><tab>そうか……さすがに、ひとりで突撃はできねぇ。
もう少し両者の様子を探って、戦力を把握しておくか……。<tab>

source:
You have good timing, adventurer. If it is work you seek, you are in luck, for we are in need of several extra hands.<tab>My unit has been informed that the kobolds are preparing to start a new dig at a nearby location and have begun hauling their tools to the site.<tab>They have yet to catch wind of me and my men, and so if we strike now, we will catch them unawares, giving us the upper hand. We may even succeed in destroying their equipment. What say you? There is a spot for you in our line, and you're entitled to any loot you find and can carry off this godsforsaken mountain. If you survive, that is!<tab>Join the unit in their assault?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>And you would watch as an opportunity such as this one slips from your fingers like sand? You adventurers are as fickle as lady fortune herself.<tab>
target:
おお、頼れそうな冒険者よ、いいところに。
このコボルド軍試掘地に動きアリとの
情報を得て、偵察に来たのですが……<tab>確かに試掘作業が開始されているようです。
奴らが、まだこちらに気づいていない今なら、
奇襲をしかけることで、試掘を妨害できるはず！<tab>よければ、
「コボルド族の採掘道具」の破壊にご協力ください。
黒渦団にあなたの名を売る、いい機会にもなりますよ。<tab>協力しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>手柄をあげる好機をみすみす逃すとは……。<tab>

source:
My daughter! They've taken my daughter!<tab>There were four of them, all dressed in robes redder than a hunter's moon. They called themselves the Lambs of Dalamud and assured me she would not be harmed, but I've heard the rumors. I know about the blood sacrifices to their pagan god!<tab>Please, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>! I beg of thee! I am but an old man, but you─you can rescue my daughter from the grim fate that awaits her.<tab>Hunt down the kidnappers?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>I will be forever in debt to you, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>!<tab><tab>First my wife...then my sons...and now my daughter... <sob><tab>
target:
お願いします、助けてください！
娘とここを歩いていたら、「最後の群民」の信者が、
突然襲いかかってきて、娘を連れ去っていったのです！！<tab>奴らは娘を抱え、この奥へ消えていきました。
ああ、このままでは娘が
「救世神ダラガブ」の生贄にされてしまう！！<tab>慈悲深く、勇気あふれる冒険者さん、お願いです！
どうか「最後の群民」から、娘を助け出してください！<tab>助けてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>ありがとうございます！
娘はこの奥にいるはずです！
<tab><tab>そんな……
どうしたら……。
<tab>

source: The Lambs of Dalamud cannot be far. Find them and save my poor daughter. She has only seen but sixteen summers!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
「最後の群民」から、娘を助け出してください！
娘はこの奥にいるはずです！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
No! Stay away!
Oh... Are you not one of them? Then you must help me! Quickly, before they return!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
お願いです、お助けください！
「最後の群民」にさらわれたんです。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
I cannot thank you enough! You do not know what this means to me and my father. He will be overjoyed at my return.<tab>But the Lambs of Dalamud... They will come again, as they have so many times in the past. They took my mother and brothers before me, and will not stop until my blood, too, has stained the desert floor, giving life to their all-powerful god.<tab>Unless, that is, we can end it... <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> can end it. The Lambs lurk nearby. I believe they watch us even now. Put them to the sword and free the peoples of northern Thanalan from the grip of fear...or it will only be a matter of time before I am drained of my lifeblood as my poor father watches...<tab>Hunt down and slay the Lambs of Dalamud?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Do our lives mean that little to you?<tab>
target:
ご親切にありがとうございます！
神様は、まだ私を見捨ててはいなかったのですね！<tab>「最後の群民」は、私を生贄にささげるために
無理やりここへ連れてきました。
奴らを倒さないかぎり、同じことが繰り返されるでしょう。<tab>ですから、親切な冒険者さん、
奴らを倒してくださいませんか？
奴らは、また儀式をするためにやってくるはずなんです。<tab>「最後の群民」と戦いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうですか……残念です。<tab>

source: Your blood will give us strength!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: さあ、おとなしく生贄となるがいい！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: ...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: ……。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
There aren't any kobolds following you, are there? I fear I can no longer outrun the beasts...<tab>You see, earlier, there were four of us, but the three storm soldiers tasked with my protection were slain by kobolds. I managed to make it this far, but my chocobo's hobbled his leg.<tab>Might you be so kind as to give me a hand leading my injured 'bo the rest of the way to Camp Overlook?<tab>Assist the coachman?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>I won't forget the face of the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who refused a stranger's plea for help, just you see.<tab>
target:
キャンプ・オーバールックへ物資を輸送中なのだが、
荷運びチョコボが怪我しちまってな……。
どうにも動けず、立ち往生しているのだ。<tab>この辺りは、コボルド族が多いから、
チョコボから目を離せず、助けも呼びに行けなくてな。<tab>ここは、荷車を押してくしかねえな……
よければ、あんた、手伝ってくれないか？<tab>手伝ってあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>あんたの顔は、忘れないぜ……。<tab>

source:
Look alive, adventurer. The hills are crawling with Amalj'aa looking to tear the head off of a soft piece of meat like yourself. Or maybe you fancy yourself a fighter? Is it blood you seek?<tab>Over yon in the Amalj'aa encampment of Zanr'ak sits a small band of the beasties. Normally, we wouldn't pay the place any mind. Gutting some low-ranking grunt roasting a marmot over a fire won't win us any wars; but my scouts report that today is different. Commander Diamondjaw Nezedd Gah, for whatever reason, has taken a place at that fire.<tab>I could wait two lifetimes and not have another chance such as this, so I'm taking my men in. Throw the bones and see where they fall, I say. If you think you can keep up, you're welcome to join. When killing's the business, the more the merrier, no?<tab>Join the raiding party?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Well, then stay out of our way. Wouldn't want one of my men tripping over your head, now.<tab>
target:
おい……そこな道行く冒険者よ。
お前、腕っ節に自信はあるか？
もしもあるならその腕前、披露してみる気はないか？<tab>実は今、ここザンラク脇本陣に
「金剛のネゼド・ガー」が来ているのだ。
奴は過去何度も、我が不滅隊の前に立ちはだかった強敵だ。<tab>今なら奴と多少の雑魚が周りにいるのみよ。
誅殺するには千載一遇ともいえる、絶好の機会なのだ。
どうだ、刺客となる気はあるか？<tab>襲撃しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうか……腕前に自信がないなら仕方ない。
自身を過大評価しないのもまた、強くなるには必要だ。
強くなれ冒険者よ、その時にこそ、力を借りよう。<tab>

source: You looking to spill some beast blood? Then you needn't look farther than Zanr'ak.<tab>I've a unit of good men and women up there bloodying lizard noses as we speak. A few of them are adventurers like yourself.<tab>Commander Diamondjaw Nezedd Gah's the target. Once he's down, we pull out. Join in if you've the stomach for it, but try to stay out of the way. I don't want to see any of my swords tripping over your impaled corpse out there.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ん？　貴様も己の腕っ節に、自信があるのか？
ならば、この上の「ザンラク脇本陣」へ乗り込むといい。<tab>今ここには「金剛のネゼド・ガー」という強敵がおってな、
先ほど腕の立つ冒険者に、その退治を依頼したところだ。<tab>なんなら、貴様が倒してしまっても構わんぞ？
「金剛のネゼド・ガー」を仕留められるのであるならば、
我らは誰が討ち果たしたかなど、気にせぬからな。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
A good Wood Wailer knows that the best way to cure a poison is to use the poison itself. It matters little that I do not know how <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> a poison can be its own antidote, only that I know it is. And that is why I'm a good Wood Wailer. Or so I've been told.<tab>A good Wood Wailer <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> knows that if he can get someone else to collect the poison to create that antidote, there is less chance for him to actually be poisoned in the first place.<tab>Not that I want <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to get poisoned. No. I just want you to collect poison spores. You would only get poisoned if you were careless anyway. Or unlucky.<tab>Collect poison spores for the Wood Wailer?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Well, that was...unexpected. You wouldn't imagine how many adventurers are turned off by my little pep talk. But enough chitchat, eh? The spores await!<tab><tab>Somehow I knew you were going to say that. Was it the pep talk? Should I not have mentioned the poison?<tab>
target:
そこの君、我々鬼哭隊の活動に協力を求めたい！
現在、強心作用のある治癒薬を開発中……らしくてな、
ぜひとも、君の力を貸してはくれないだろうか？<tab>鬼哭隊の職分を超えているように思うかもしれぬが、
我々の職務は、外敵に抗することだけではない。
このような活動も立派な……と、話がそれてしまった。<tab>ともかく……治癒薬をつくるために、
素材となるらしい「毒キノコの胞子」を、集めてくれぬか？
開発中ゆえ量はいくらあっても困らん、頼んだぞ！<tab>引き受けますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>引き受けてくれるか……！。
「毒キノコの胞子」はこの周辺で採れる……らしい。
くれぐれも頼む、任せたからな？<tab><tab>そうか……残念だが仕方ない。
ほかの者をあたるとしよう。<tab>

source: I have taken my share of antidotes since joining the Wailers. There was that time I was sitting in the grass picking daisies when a garter snake slithered right up my bodice and bit me in the─ Wait, shouldn't you be collecting spores?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
「毒キノコの胞子」に強心作用が本当にあるのかだと？
……そんなこと、一介の現場の者にはわからぬよ。
私だって、上から集めて来いと命令されただけなのだ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: You look well enough. The poison doesn't seem to be doing any lasting damage. So, then. Have you collected any spores?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ah yes. You don't mind if I have you slip those directly in my bag here, do you? I wouldn't want to accidentally get any on me and become─<gasp>─poisoned. Thank you.<tab>You wouldn't...ah...happen to have any more, would you?<tab>No spores? Then what is that, exactly, on your hands, seeping into your humours as we speak? Perhaps I forgot to mention, poison is used to <var 1A 02 /var>make<var 1A 01 /var> the antidote. It is not the antidote itself. Are you certain you do not wish to hand it over?<tab>
target:
「毒キノコの胞子」を見つけたか？<tab><tab><tab><tab>うーん、これでいい……のだろうか？
いやすまない、恥ずかしながら私は実物を見たことがない。
上から聞いた話のかぎりでは、大丈夫だと思うが……。<tab>いや、きっとこれでいいのだろう、いいに違いない！
君、もっと集めてきてくれないか！！<tab>む……そうか、持ってきたのではないのか。
「毒キノコの胞子」は、身体にいいものではないと聞く。
見つけたら、早めに私に渡した方が安全ではないか？<tab>

source: Yes, this should be more than enough to prepare the antidote. I may get a whole bottle this time! No more twelve seconds of suffering when I step on that next stray funguar.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
きっとこれだけあれば充分だろう！
私はそろそろ部隊に戻らなければならないので、
まだ「毒キノコの胞子」があったら早めに持ってきてくれ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Aren't we the eager one? I suppose I could take more spores. It is the least I can do after you spent all the time and effort in gathering them.<tab><tab><tab><tab>Yes. Remember, directly into the bag─and gently. The last thing I need is a cloud of spores corrupting my lungs. Thank you.<tab><tab>No spores? Then what is that, exactly, on your hands, seeping into your humours as we speak? Perhaps I forgot to mention, poison is used to <var 1A 02 /var>make<var 1A 01 /var> the antidote. It is not the antidote itself. Are you certain you do not wish to hand it over?<tab>
target:
おお、「毒キノコの胞子」を
持ってきてくれたのか、冒険者よ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>うむ、「毒キノコの胞子」に相違ないな。
まだ少し時間がある、持ってきてくれるのならば、
受け取るのでよろしく頼むぞ。<tab><tab>「毒キノコの胞子」を渡してくれるのではないのか？
まぁ……君が持っていたというのなら、止めはしない。
だが、取り扱いにだけは、十分気を付けてくれよ。<tab>

source:
If I may, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. I's but a Wineport housebond, tasked with tendin' the vines.<tab>However, truth be told, 'tis not I what does the bulk o' the work, but the wood's goodly bees. Still, I must find all manner of ways to lure the flyin' faeries up to the vines. O'er the seasons, I's found that raincatcher nectar does a right job.<tab>If it weren't for them bloody pink devils, I'd already have the sweet stuff up on the vines, but a man of me age ain't built to weather a beak to the gut. Might I ask <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> to collect the nectar in me stead? Me master will pay handsomely.<tab>Collect raincatcher nectar?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>A thousand thanks and a thousand more! I'll wait here for the nectar while you give them colibri what's comin' to 'em!<tab><tab>Me master won't be pleased, and I know not how many more lashin's me back can take...<tab>
target:
ごきげんいかがかな、冒険者さん。
レインキャッチャーという植物を知っているかい？
この辺りに生えてる、器のような赤い花の植物さ。<tab>こいつ花の蜜が、
蜜蜂を寄せつけるのに最適でね！
ブドウ畑の受粉のために、利用したいんだ。<tab>ただ、コリブリも蜜を狙ってるもんで、
蜜集めがはかどらなくて。
よかったら蜜集めを手伝ってくれないか？<tab>「レインキャッチャーの蜜」を集めてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>恩に着る！
いやあ、親切な冒険者さんと
出会えてよかったよ。<tab><tab>それなら、自力でなんとかしてみる……。
ごきげんよう、冒険者さん。お気をつけて。<tab>

source: You'll find the nectar deep inside the raincatchers' pots. 'Tis what the plants use to lure flies and squirrels and whatnot inside, so that they might drown the vile things and suck the meager meat straight from the bones. Only the Twelve know how nectar from such a vile flower can be so sweet.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
「レインキャッチャーの蜜」を集めてきてくれ。
コリブリたちも蜜を狙っているから、
奴らをさっさと退治したほうが、蜜集めがはかどるよ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bring us back some nectar, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ah, the nectar! So sweet, I could smell you comin' from half a malm distant! Many thanks, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Many thanks!<tab><tab>Pardon me, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. I did not mean to offend.<tab>
target:
「レインキャッチャーの蜜」は、集まったかい？<tab><tab><tab><tab>そうそう、この蜜だ。ありがとう！
この香り……一発でレインキャッチャーとわかるよ。<tab><tab>レインキャッチャーは背の高い赤い花だよ。<tab>

source: Praise the Twelve! Me bucket's almost full, and there's still a bell to spare. Best be I pack up and make me way back to the vineyard. Though, I still reckon I can find room in the pail for a few more drops, if they was brought to me swift, like.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
「レインキャッチャーの蜜」は十分集まったよ。
なんだかもう、蜜蜂の羽音が聞こえてくる気がするよ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Might <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> have brought back even more nectar?<tab><tab><tab><tab>That was right kindly of you, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. With this much, me master may just forget the cane tonight.<tab><tab>Pardon me, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. I did not mean to offend.<tab>
target:
「レインキャッチャーの蜜」を集めてくれたのか？<tab><tab><tab><tab>うわー、ありがとう。
こんなに集めてくれるなんて、
頼もしい冒険者と出会えてよかったよ！<tab><tab>ちょうどよかった。
もう十分な量が集まったんだ。<tab>

source:
D-D-Did you hear that? And that? And <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!? This d<var 1F /var>d<var 1F /var>damnable jungle will have my sanity before the sun has turned.<tab>I seek only to return home to my wife, my wine, and my warm p<var 1F /var>p<var 1F /var>pair of ph<var 1F /var>ph<var 1F /var>phurbleskin room slippers. But look. My legs are j<var 1F /var>j<var 1F /var>jelly and the sweat pours forth from my brow like there was a raging river inside my head.<tab>I simply c-c-c-c-cannot make the journey! B<var 1F /var>B<var 1F /var>But if there were someone to clear the path for me...<tab>Assist the off-duty porter?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>You have put my heart at ease, good friend. Now let us hurry before the fear takes me again.<tab><tab>Wh-Wh-What would you have me do then!?<tab>
target:
冒険者か……
見てくれよ、街道に魔物があふれてる……<tab>行きは、こんな状態じゃなかったのに
これじゃ、いつになったら家に帰れることやら……
新婚なもんで、早く帰りたいのに……。<tab>なあ、もしあんたもここを通るなら、
ついでに、魔物を退治してくれないか？<tab>退治してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>おお、助かるぜ。
これで、早く妻に会えそうだ。<tab><tab>そ、そんな……。
さては、新婚の俺への嫉妬だな……？<tab>

source: Th-Th-Th-They surround us! D-D-Do something!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
街道の魔物を退治してくれよ！
このままじゃ家に帰れないんだ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Save us! Saaave us! The man of stone, he walks! The man of stone, he kills!<tab>O benevolent Lord of Crags! Why have You forsaken Your children!? Are we not worthy of saving from this terrible man of stone!? <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
たーいへん、たーいへん！
鉱山で　ほりだしーた石像
動きだしーて　あばれだしーた！<tab>あぶなくーて　鉱山　はいれなーい！
石像　鉱山　でてきたーら　もっとあぶなーい。
だれーか　石像　こわしーて　ほしーな！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The imperials cannot be allowed to leave this grove alive. We must use the tempered sylphs to our advantage and only engage them if they attack first. Enemies though they may be, they are still children of the forest. Their fates are to be decided by the elementals.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
帝国兵とテンパードシルフとの戦いが激化すれば、
より大きな戦火が広がってしまう……！
いいか、今は帝国兵を優先的に攻撃するんだ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I would join you in battle if I could, but my wounds... I fear they would only burden you.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
協力してくださる冒険者の方ですね？
ありがとうございます……実のところを申せば、
ジャイアント族と戦うことに、不安を覚えていましたから。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: It has been long believed that giants only possess the cognitive ability of a common field mouse, but if they are selectively destroying the research, while leaving the other crates undamaged...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: 奴らに、資材を狙う知恵があったとはな……。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: My legs and back grow tired. Let us gather what we can and be off.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ひぃ～、クタクタだ。
さっさと荷物片付けて、休憩しようぜ、なあ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: We must make haste. I have this sinking feeling that we have not seen the last of our giant friends.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
早いとこ搬入したほうがいいわね。
また来るかもしれないし。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: For them to pursue us this far! Whatever is it that drives these creatures!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
おわっ！？
安全だと思ってたのに……ここまで追ってきたなんて！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: There they are. I thought we may have one last chance to discuss this like civilized men, but those devilish grins speak otherwise.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
くそっ、邪魔くさいジャイアント族だぜっ！
けど……今の俺たちの装備じゃどうにもなんねぇ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: One more bell in this cold and my arse will <var 1A 02 /var>literally<var 1A 01 /var> freeze off: fall right from my backside and shatter into a thousand pieces upon the tundra. Why couldn't we have been assigned to studying the mysteries of the barnacles of Costa del Sol?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
たいちょー！
なんだか寒くなってきたし、今日は諦めて戻りませんか？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The more I see of these giants, the more convinced I am of how foolish I was for ever believing that I might reason with the lumbering lummoxes.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
頼むぞ、冒険者！
今は君だけが頼りなのだ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Just how many of these things can there be!? I shudder at the thought!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ホントに頼むぜ、おい。
あんたらみたいなのがやってくれねぇと、
こっちが困っちまうんでな。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I say, are all adventurers as brave and noble as you? Because rumor has it that you are all merciless bandits who'll cut an old woman's throat if there's gil to be had for doing it. You wouldn't cut my throat, would you?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
こういう時にこそ頼れるのが冒険者。
バッチリ決めてくれちゃってよね！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I believe I saw some of my companions in the distance. Let us wait here for them to join us.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
一旦、休憩だ。
遅れている者が追いつき次第、出発する。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: There! I see the rest of my caravan...but something's wrong... Could it be they are under attack?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
参りましたなぁ……これは。
一体どうしたんでしょう、もう追いついてもいいのに。
まさか、何かトラブルにでも巻き込まれて……?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Please! I cannot be left to die like this!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
た、助けてくれぇぇぇっ！
私は、私は死にたくなぃぃぃっ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Why me!? Why meee!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
いやぁ！
どうして、どうしてこんなことに！
誰か助けてよぉ……！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: If I only had a blade...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ああもうっ、じれったい！
あんなの、さっさと片付けちまえっ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Let the fools kill each other. It will save the rest of us the trouble.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
……このまま共倒れして、
俺が捕まったこと、ウヤムヤにできねーかな……？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Greetings, adventurer. Are you perchance here to join our splendidly spooky parade? There is nothing to it, I assure you.<tab>When the parade begins, speak with the unusual illusionist yonder. He will grant a form at once festive and frightening. While in this form, pray cast the Festal Cant charm upon those spectators who have come to watch.<tab>So, what say you? Will you join our petrifying procession, and bring happiness and fortune to the people?<tab>Participate in the parade?<tab><tab><tab>Oh? Does my description of our creepy cavalcade fill you with terror? Unfortunate, that. Should you manage to muster your courage, you will find me here.<tab>
target:
これから始まる「コンチネンタル・パレード」は、
みんなが驚く姿に「変身」して、回廊を練り歩く催し……。<tab>パレードが始まったら「妖しい奇術師」に変身させてもらって……
そして、見物客の「ウルダハの市民」たちに、
幸運の「おまじない」をかけてあげるのよ……クスクス……。<tab>このパンプキンヘッドとともに、
楽しい楽しいパレードをしましょう……クスクス……。
どう？　あなたも参加してくださらない？<tab>パレードを始めますか？<tab><tab><tab>そう、残念だわ……。
始めたくなったら声をかけて……クスクス……。<tab>

I simply misplaced a few kupo nuts, and now the whole world is after me, kupo!<tab>Yes, I might have misplaced them <var 1A 02 /var>in<var 1A 01 /var> the nose of a sleeping scaly-crawly...but is that truly cause to condemn a poor, defenseless moogle, kupo?<tab>Save Mogoosh from his own undoing?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>But I did nothing wrong, kupo!<tab>

source:
That misbehaving Mogoosh has plucked one too many poms, nicked one too many nuts, and drubbed one too many dragons. What he <var 1A 02 /var>needs<var 1A 01 /var> is a good cuff on his tuft...but not with some soft moogle mitt. No, it should be a hard bony fist......like the one <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> just so happen to have, kupo!<tab>Lend your adequately bony fist?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>No fist? I suppose, then, an ordinary rock will have to suffice, kupo.<tab>

身勝手なあいつのせいで、仲間が迷惑してるくぽ。
根性を叩きなおしてほしいくぽ～！<tab>叩きなおしてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>がーん！　それは残念くぽ……。

source: More! I must have more! I cannot be out-twinkled! I must not be out-sparkled! Did you bring me more twinkling, kupo?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Mwah hah! No more will they laugh at me, kupo! source:

source:

私も挑戦してみたが……桁外れの強さだった。
すがすがしいほどにあっさり負けたよ。<tab>こいつの名は、「鋭槍のアランベール」。
イシュガルドでも屈指の精鋭「竜騎士団」に所属する、
若き竜騎士だそうだ。<tab>私がこれまで会った中で、間違いなく最強の男だ。
どうだ、挑戦してみないか？<tab>勝負をしますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうだな、やめておけ……賢明な判断だ。
私はそれができず、身のほどというものを思い知らされた。<tab>

source:
Shkoh... Shkoh... Shkoh...
Browfix remembers not how many wordleaves were wrongtaken, but backtaken have been more than few. Maybe less than few remain now.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
研究資料　だいぶ　そろった～！
これで　はかどる　研究調査！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Shkoh... Shkoh... Shkoh...
More! More! There must be more!<tab>The scent of lofty knowledge in wrongtaken wordleaves tickles Browfix's noseholes!<tab><tab><tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Fewthanks remain for uplander who claims manythanks of Browfix, but morethanks I will find!<tab><tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Has the goodly uplander found many and more of wrongtaken wordleaves?<tab>
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
研究資料　集めてくれて～！
ありがとう～！<tab>もっともっと　欲しいかも～！
欠けてる資料　もっとある～！<tab><tab><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
こいつは　新しい　資料？
我々　とても助か～る！<tab><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
研究資料　見つからない？<tab>

source:
Shkoh... Shkoh... Shkoh...
The fishmen are the slipperiest of sorts. They seek not wordleaves for their lofty knowledge, but for their deliciousness!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
あたりにちらばった資料　持ってきて！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Shkoh... Shkoh... Shkoh...
The fishmen have wrongtaken wordleaves meant for Browfix's braincase and fled!<tab>My halflegs cannot carry me with swiftness of slippery scales. I seek busydeal with uplander who has embiggened strongarms atop enswifted heels!<tab>Might you be uplander Browfix seeks?<tab>Help Browfix retrieve his lost folios?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Manythanks I have for the giving! Manythanks for giving when wordleaves return!<tab><tab>Pshhhhhh...
My braincase mourns uplander's unkindness...<tab>
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
ここには　研究資料　たっくさん！
残したのは　図書館　作ったヒトたち！<tab>このあたりで　資料の一部　見つかった！
だけど「青の手」攻めてきて　資料バッラバラ！<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
資料　拾ったら　持ってきて！
もしかすると　魔物が　持ってるかも！<tab>協力してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
助かった！
これで調査も　はかど～る！<tab><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
それは残念　ハァ　どうする……。<tab>

source:
Shkoh... Shkoh... Shkoh...
Browfix remembers not how many wordleaves were wrongtaken, but backtaken have been less than few. More! More! There must be more!<tab><tab><tab><tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Manythanks I am giving to uplander! Many morethanks to be given upon backhand of wordleaves!<tab><tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
More and many of wrongtaken wordleaves remain unfound. Will goodly uplander see them back to Browfix?<tab>
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
図書館作ったヒトたち　貴重な研究　いっぱいしてた
だから　貴重な資料も　いっぱ～い！<tab><tab><tab><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
貴重な資料　ありがと～！
きっともっと　あるはず～！<tab><tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
研究資料　きっともっと　いっぱいあるはず！
もっとたくさん　集めた～い！<tab>

source:
Ser Werner has sullied the Convictors' name one too many times, and I shall not stand idly by as he has the effrontery to snatch glory from the hands of the deserving.<tab>Honor binds me from crossing blades with my sworn brother, but it does not bind me from <var 1A 02 /var>aiding<var 1A 01 /var> one who might have been <var 1A 02 /var>wrongly assaulted<var 1A 01 /var> by a conniving lout of a brother. What say you, adventurer?<tab>Uphold Ser Beaudonet's honor by disciplining Ser Werner?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>You, too would see the name of the Convictors' sullied? Then you are no better than Ser Werner... Nay, worse.<tab>
target:
聞いてくれ。
こいつは、栄えある「聖フィネア連隊」にふさわしくない男だ。
仲間の手柄を横取りする、悪癖があるんだ！<tab>何としても、懲らしめてやりたいんだが……
タチの悪いことに、こいつ、腕はそこそこ立つ。
ひとつ、手伝ってはくれないか？<tab>手伝ってあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>そうか……。
見ず知らずの相手に頼まれても、困るよな。
すまない、忘れてくれ。<tab>

source: Come! I shall prove to any and all the might of the Knights Dragoon!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
もっと！
もっと、私の心を滾らせてくれる者はいないものか！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Those good-for-naught pom-clods! They said they'd be here by now, kupo!<tab>If the ancient covenant says <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> moogles of Moghome must tend to the holy tower, why is it always yours-kupo-truly who finds himself stuck wiping down the walls by his lonesome?<tab><sigh> You wouldn't happen to be on your way to Zenith, would you? I've drawn the small nut and now must take one in the pom to see my ungrateful brothers remain in Hraesvelgr's good graces. Problem is, I don't think I can make it there on my own, kupo.<tab>Escort the moogle to Zenith?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Mog it! If Hraesvelgr wants to come down from the lofty heavens and raze Moghome, let him! At least I'll never have to wipe a wall again.<tab>
target:
こんにちはくぽ。
もしかして、「白亜の宮殿」まで、
向かう途中だったりするくぽ？<tab>モグは、「白亜の宮殿」に行くとこくぽ。
お掃除が大好きで、いつもきれいにしてあげてるくぽ。<tab>今日は、いつも一緒に行くおともだちがいないくぽ。
心細いから、一緒に行ってほしいくぽ！<tab>護衛してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>残念だけど、仕方ないくぽ。
くぽぽ……こわいこわいくぽ……。<tab>

source:
<var 08 E905 ((Daughter)) ((Son)) /var> of the Land, you are here in our realm at the blessing of Vidofnir, which means there is good within you.<tab>Mine uncle, known by your people as Galar of the Second Sun, ever loyal servant of Hraesvelgr, is beset by minions of Nidhogg.<tab>I ask with humble heart that you lend him your strength, for without aid, I do not believe he will survive much longer, and I am too young and weak to alter the tide of battle.<tab>Save Galar?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Then you have condemned him to death... Perhaps Vidofnir was mistaken...<tab>
target:
ね、ねぇ……あなたって、
ヴィゾーヴニル様のお知り合いだよね？
お願い、助けてほしいんだ！<tab>邪竜の眷属たちに襲われて……
僕を逃がすために、おじさんが残って戦ってるんだ。
ここまで逃げてきたけど、やっぱりおじさんが心配で……。<tab>だからお願い！
僕のおじさん……「ガラール」を助けて！<tab>助けてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そんな……。
どうしよう。<tab>

source:
<var 08 E905 ((Daughter)) ((Son)) /var> of the Land, did the battle cry of my black-hearted kin reach your ears?<tab>The followers of Nidhogg approach, seeking that which they can never have.<tab>Would you watch as I clip their wings and watch them fall to Hydaelyn's bosom, or would you stand with me, weapons drawn like a true hero of Her choosing?<tab>Join Fjalar in his battle against the Horde?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Then you may wish to watch from afar, lest the dragons smell your fear.<tab>
target:
冒険者よ、好いところに来た。
先の咆哮が聞こえたか？
あれは、ドラゴン族の襲撃前の合図。<tab>邪竜の眷属どもが、すぐ近くに集結しているようだ。
すでに、かなりの数が集まっている気配がある……。<tab>だがこの我がいるかぎり、心配は無用……。
徒党を組まねば何もできぬ連中など、恐るるに足らん！
ともに戦うというならば、拒みはせぬがな！<tab>ともに戦いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>ならば、早くここから離れろ。
巻き込まれでもしたら、ただでは済まんぞ！<tab>

source: Do you hear something coming from that creature's belly? I could swear I heard something, kupo...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
くぽぽ……モグのおともだちが見当たらないくぽ。
でも、アイツのお腹から、くぽくぽ聞こえる、
気がするくぽ……どういうことくぽ？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Fleas! They're everywhere! In me hair, in me buskins, in me godsdamned codpiece!<tab>Here, ye can even have the coin I was paid for that last chocobo. Just keep the bloody buggers off me!<tab>Fight off the fleas?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>I cannot blame ye. I wouldn't wish such a fate on me worst enemy...or me best enemy, for that matter.<tab>
target:
オレの頼みを聞いてくれ。
ここらに棲む虫どもに、やたらと寄りつかれて困っている。
何とか、撃退してほしいんだ！<tab>何故か、オレばかり虫に好かれるんだ……。
寄りつかれてからじゃ、手後れだ。
悪いが、探し出してやっつけてくれよ！<tab>助けてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>手伝う気になったらいつでも言ってくれ。
よろしく頼む！<tab>

source: The Gundu are mostly bark, and little bite...but that bark can be quite annoying, especially when trying to catch a few moments slumber after a sixteen-bell training regimen. Luckily, a quick slap on the wrist should send them fluttering back to their huts. Would you consider joining the effort? You will be compensated.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
グンド族に追われている。
あいつらを撃退してもらえばありがたい。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Kind netherling, with heart as warm as shining sun! Throats of the Zundu are parched, like dried grass after moons without rain...<tab>Zundu would fetch water, but thirst makes our limbs heavy as tree trunks. Kind netherling comes to poor Zundu's aid, yes?<tab>Fetch water for the Zundu?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>Hunt sprites for their cores, or find those lying about. Bring them to us, and Zundu throats will feel the gentle caress of pure water.<tab><tab>Forgive us, netherling. Zundu seek not the aid of strangers.<tab>
target:
そこの、そこの、旅のヒト！
そこらにたくさんおる「クラウド・スプライト」から、
「湧水の核」を集めてはくれぬか？<tab>実は、実は、我らの郷で、綺麗な水が不足しておってな。
「湧水の核」は、水のもと。
溶かせば、雨の水より、清らかな水になるのだ。<tab>手を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>そうだ、そうだ、「湧水の核」は、
クラウド・スプライトを狩るか、
落ちているものを、拾って集めてほしい。<tab><tab>すまぬ、すまぬ、
我らと関係のない者まで、巻き込もうとしておった……。<tab>

source: Netherling! Do you return with the watery succor Zundu seek?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ahhh... I can feel the pure waters trickling down my throat like a gentle brook!<tab><tab>This is unfortunate, but I suppose there is nothing to be done.<tab>
target:
どうだ、どうだ？
「湧水の核」は集まったか……？<tab><tab><tab><tab>好いぞ、好いぞ。
もっと、もっと、持ってきてほしい。<tab><tab>そうか、そうか。
残念ではあるが、仕方あるまい。<tab>

source: I collect spring cores to bring succor to my brothers. Does netherling bring some to us?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
我は、我は、「湧水の核」を集めている……。
持っているなら、譲ってくれぬか？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Stock of spring cores swells like a burgeoning river. But Zundu must have more to sate our thirst.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
だいぶ、だいぶ、集まった。
「湧水の核」は、集まった。
だが、もしもまだあるなら、譲ってほしい。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Yes, yes, this will do. But Zundu can never have enough water. Any more netherling brings will be welcome.<tab><tab><tab><tab>Thank you, netherling. Your kindness tickles our hearts like a gentle rain.<tab><tab>That is fine, netherling. You have brought the Zundu enough succor for today.<tab>
target:
よし、よし。
なんとか「湧水の核」が集まった。
もっとあれば、もっと助かる。<tab><tab><tab><tab>ありがたい、ありがたい。
恵みの時雨のごとき、優しいお方だ。<tab><tab>そうか、そうか、かまわない。
必要な量は、集まった。<tab>

source:
Netherling, hear my plea! Zundu suffers long as prisoner of the Vundu. Vundu chief uses my poor back as stool for his stinky feet─an unending storm of pain and indignity!<tab>Zundu escapes, flies here with the speed of gusting winds. But my weary legs can carry me no further...<tab>Oh, how I long to feel the gentle breeze of Ok' Zundu once more! Netherling will guide me home, yes?<tab>Guide the harried Zundu home?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>Netherling's heart is as cold and callous as the Vundu!<tab>
target:
我を、我を、助けてほしい。
雪嵐のように横暴な、ブンド族の奴らに、
追われておる。<tab>あれは、あれは、いつだったか。
奴らに囚われ、過酷な仕事を強要された。
やっとの思いで、逃げ出したのだ。<tab>しかし、しかし、足を怪我して、
思うように、歩けない。
我が郷に着くまで、護ってはもらえぬか？<tab>護衛してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>なんと、なんと、酷いヒトか……！<tab>

source:
<buzzzzzz> ...sors detect critical malfunction in engineering units T76 through T9... <buzzzzzz> Requesting emergency shutd... <buzzzzzz><tab>Answer request?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><buzzzzzz><tab>
target:
ザザ……ザ……こちらは「検査システム」。
センサーが工作機械の異常動作を検知しました。
強制停止を要請します。<tab>協力しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>ザザ……ザ……。<tab>

source:
My brother, Rhei End has yet to return from his maunderings. I fear he may be in danger.<tab>Nidhogg cares little and less for the blood bonds he has with those who do not follow him to the darkness. If Rhei End is discovered by the dread wyrm's minions, no mercy will be shown...<tab>Assist the dragonling in locating Rhei End?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>I thought, perhaps, children of the land would place similar value on kith and kin as do we dragons. I see I still have much to learn of your kind.<tab>
target:
友だちが出かけたまま、帰ってこないんだ。
僕と同じくらいの、若いドラゴン族を見なかった？<tab>邪竜の眷属に襲われたんじゃないかって、心配なんだ。
お願い、友だちを探してくれないかな……？<tab>探してあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>いきなり頼んじゃって、ごめんね。
僕はここで、友だちを待ってることにするよ……。<tab>

source:
Who would have thought gaelicats would be attracted to catmint? Everyone? You're probably right... But that does not mean we can stand here and watch as the beasts tear through our camp! Lend us your talents, adventurer, and the Rosehouse will reward you nicely.<tab>Cast off the clowder?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>Well...I suppose the cats will leave once the mint is gone. Though, we'll still have that vilekin problem to deal with...<tab>
target:
「ゲイラキャット」という魔物に再三の襲撃を受けている。
糧食の中に、何やら好物が混じっているらしくてな。
貴重な食いモノを守るため、協力してはくれまいか？<tab>協力しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>無理を言って悪かった。
ここは補給も潤沢ではない、辺境の基地。
食いモノの話は、死活問題なのでな……。<tab>

source: A well-crafted arrow is worth its weight in gold, and master fletchers swear by wild chocobo feathers, claiming them the best in the realm if you would see your arrow fly straight and true.<tab>There are molted feathers lying about the forest here, but you may find that some end up stuck to the backsides of the hairy beasts who lurk about the trees.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ワイルドチョコボの羽根が必要なんだ。
矢羽根の材料に、ぴったりなんでな……。
このあたりに落ちているから、拾ってきてくれないか。<tab>抜けた羽根が、魔物にくっついていることも結構ある。
腕に自信があるなら、魔物を倒して拾うのもアリだ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
A hunter can never have too many arrows. The materials to make those arrows, however, can oft prove difficult to come by, especially if what you seek is firm, unbent, unfrayed feathers for the fletchings.<tab>I'll be out here searching for fallen feathers myself for another bell or so, but if you'd like to join me, I will pay good coin for any feather you bring me. You have my word.<tab>Find feathers for the hunter?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>Suit yourself, then.<tab>
target:
このあたりで、チョコボが魔物に襲われていた。
抜けたばかりのワイルドチョコボの羽根が、
あちこちにちらばってるはずだ。<tab>頼む、ワイルドチョコボの羽根を集めてきてくれないか？
オレたちゃそれを、矢羽根の材料にして、
その矢でチョコボを狩る……って寸法さ！<tab>手伝いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>そうか、残念だ……。
たくさん使うんだが、まだまだ足りなくてな……。<tab>

source: Have you any feathers for trade?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Beautiful. Feathers as these will see mine arrows will fly true.<tab><tab>Well, the offer still stands, should you come across any.<tab>
target:
ワイルドチョコボの羽根を、
持ってきてくれたのか？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ありがとう、助かる！
もっと集めてくれるとうれしい！<tab><tab>そうか、残念だ。
ワイルドチョコボの羽根がたくさん必要なんだ。<tab>

source: I have more than enough feathers to fill my quiver for a sennight at least...but like I said, a hunter can never have too many arrows. I welcome for trade any more you may find.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
おかげで、ワイルドチョコボの羽根がかなり集まった。
とはいえ、あればあるほど助かる……。
もっと持ってきてくれるのは歓迎だ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: If you have more feathers, I will not be the fool who turns you away.<tab><tab><tab><tab>You have my thanks, adventurer. I did not think this day would see my pack so full.<tab><tab>There must not be a single feather left in this neck of the forest!<tab>
target:
ワイルドチョコボの羽根、
ずいぶん持ってきてくれたな！
いくら感謝しても、しきれないほどだよ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>本当に助かるよ。
オレたち猟師は、矢をたくさん使うからな。いくらあっても足りないぐらいだ。<tab><tab>さすがに、もう……なかったか？<tab>

source: I thought I could escape my admirers, but I didn't expect there'd be pirates! This is always happening...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
もう、やんなっちゃう。
せっかくの休暇が台無しだわ。
アタシだって、たまにはゆっくりしたいのに～。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Seven hells, this blasted Mamool Ja won't leave. He's been banned from the festivities, but nothin' I say'll make him go away.<tab>Seems his “traditional bathing dance” has the other faire-goers in a furor─think of the children, they say! And no matter how many times we ask, he won't stop his sickening gyration.<tab>He's left us no choice─we'll have to drive him from the beaches. Lend us your strength, friend, as it isn't easy to control such...passion.<tab>Drive away the passionate Mamool Ja?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>I understand... If this weren't my job, I'd just want to laze about on the beach too. Suppose I've no choice but to drive him off myself... For the children!<tab>
target:
ん、何を揉めてるかって？
実は彼、ここを出禁になっててねぇ。
お引き取り願おうとしているのさ。<tab>マムージャ族の水浴みの踊りが卑猥だと、
ほかの客から苦情が殺到してるもんで、
やめるよう頼んでるんだが、聞いてくれなくてね……。<tab>もはや、腕ずくで止めるしかない状況さ。
よければ、あんたも手を貸してくれないか？<tab>手を貸しますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab>そうか……
マムージャ族は、うでっぷしが強いから不安だが、
自分でやるしかないか……。<tab>

source:
These pirates are thinking to set off their shoddy fireworks right on the beach! We can't let them put our guests in danger, and the only thing they'll listen to is force. <tab>You look like you can take on even the most black-hearted pirate. Please, get them off the beach before anyone comes to harm!<tab>Stop the pirates from setting off the fireworks?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>Can't say I blame you. Those pirates seem set on blowing us all up. I suppose I'll wait till someone else comes along.<tab>
target:
そこの海賊たちが、お手製花火を打ち上げようとしているんだ！
危ないからやめろって説得しても、聞く耳持たないんだよ。
もう、力ずくで止めるしかないみたいだ。<tab>ねえ君、もし腕に自信があるなら、
海賊たちを止めてもらえないかな？
正直、僕には自信がないんだ……。<tab>止めてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>そうか……残念だよ。
無理を言ってごめん、ほかの人に頼むよ。<tab>

source: The pirates've thrown bottles of their grog all over the beaches. They'll be boozing until sunrise if we just let them be. <tab>I don't care if you need to pry them from their drunken fingers, just bring me as many as you can carry!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
この辺の砂浜にある、
「海賊の密造酒」を回収してきてほしいんだ。<tab>海賊が持っているものを、力ずくで奪ってきても構わないよ。
どちらでもいい、君次第だ。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
The pirates here have been bad enough, but with some drink in them it's even worse! They've brought barrels of their black market grog: enough to keep them going for a while.<tab>We can't have them disturbing our guests and dirtying the beach any longer. Get as many bottles of that nasty stuff as you can. I don't care if you need to take it straight out of their fumbling hands, either.<tab>Help the chaperone bring peace and cleanliness to the beach?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>Well, as long as you don't have a mind to join the pirates in their boozing. They won't be leaving any time soon, so speak to me again if you feel like lending a hand.<tab>
target:
まったく、海賊たちにはほとほと困ったもんだ。
あろうことか、勝手に大量の密造酒を持ち込んで、
酒盛りをしようとしているんだ。<tab>これ以上、会場を荒らされるわけにはいかないから、
砂浜にある「海賊の密造酒」を回収してきてほしい。
なんなら、海賊から力ずくで奪ってきても構わないよ。<tab>手伝いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>楽しんでるところ悪かった。
手伝う気になったら、また声をかけてくれ。<tab>

source: Were you able to collect any bottles of that nasty grog?<tab><tab><tab><tab>You have my thanks. Looks like the pirates still have plenty left, so bring them to me once you've collected them.<tab><tab>Hmmm...I don't think that's all of it. If you see any, make sure to bring them straight here.<tab>
target:
「海賊の密造酒」を回収してきてくれたのか？<tab><tab><tab><tab>助かる！
まだまだあるようだ、どんどん回収してきてくれ。<tab><tab>もう無くなったかな……？
悪いがまだあったら、回収してきてほしい。<tab>

source: Hopefully this keeps the pirates from getting out of hand. The beach is a mite cleaner too, but there's still grog lying about. Bring me any more bottles you find.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
たくさん回収してくれたおかげで、ずいぶん減ったようだ。
だが、砂浜をキレイにするためにも、
さらに回収してきてほしい。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I knew there'd be more─how much grog did the pirates bring?<tab><tab><tab><tab>What a haul! Nothing left for the pirates to do now but sleep it off.<tab><tab>But they did bring barrels of the stuff. If you see any more, bring them here before the pirates think to start drinking again.<tab>
target:
さらに回収してきてくれたのかい？<tab><tab><tab><tab>本当にありがとう！
これで海賊たちも、しばらくは大人しくなるだろう。<tab><tab>回収し尽くしてしまったか？
もし、まだあったら、回収してくれるとありがたい。<tab>

source:
These pirates have been following us up and down the beach. Please, make them go away!<tab>Help the distressed faire-goers?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>Then what good are you!? Can't you see we're in trouble!?<tab>
target:
この人たち、さっきからしつこいんです！
助けてくれませんか！？<tab>助けてあげますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>あ～も～！
いいかげんにしてよ～！<tab>

source: Having cyclopes pound the rice for us seemed an excellent idea at first...until we realized that they had no intention of ceasing their earth-shattering blows.<tab>Might you brave this titan's hammer, and retrieve our precious mochi? Pray hand any advent cakes you rescue to Jiromaru here.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
怪力のサイクロプスを借り受けて、
餅をつかせたまでは良かったのですが……。
危険すぎて、近寄れなくなってしまいました。<tab>どうにか「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収していただけませんか。
持ってきた餅は「ジロウマル」に渡してください。<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Having cyclopes pound the rice for us seemed an excellent idea at first...until we realized that they had no intention of ceasing their earth-shattering blows.<tab>Might you brave this titan's hammer, and retrieve our precious mochi? Pray hand any advent cakes you rescue to Jiromaru here.<tab>Assist with retrieving the mochi?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>You are not willing to aid us, then? I understand. A single poorly timed attempt would leave you naught but a smear on that monster's mallet...  <tab>
target:
怪力のサイクロプスを借り受けて、
餅をつかせたまでは良かったのですが……。
危険すぎて、近寄れなくなってしまいました。<tab>どうにか「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収していただけませんか。
持ってきた餅は「ジロウマル」に渡してください。<tab>手伝いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>そ、そうですか……。
確かにあのサイクロプスの暴れぶりを見たら、
誰でも尻込みしてしまいますよね……。<tab>

source: Ook!?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ook ook!<tab><tab>...Ook.<tab>
target: ウキー！？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ウッキキー！<tab><tab>……ウキー。<tab>

source: We have gathered quite a respectable supply for the festival. But as they say, the more mochi the merrier! Pray retrieve as many advent cakes as you can!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
多くの「降神餅」が集まりました！
振る舞う餅は、多ければ多いほど良いのです。
もっともっと、回収していただけますか？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ook ook!<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ook ook ook!<tab><tab>Ook! Ook ook!<tab>
target: ウキキー！<tab><tab><tab><tab>ウキキッキー！<tab><tab>ウキー！　ウキッキー！<tab>

source: Ook!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: ウキッ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ook ook!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: キキー！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: You give eeeggs! Faaast eeeggs! Lots of eeeeeeggs!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
エゴ、エゴ、エゴル、エゴロロロォ～ッ♪
タマゴ、アツメル、エッゴロロ～♪<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Shiiiny eeeggs! But need more. Need more eeeggs!<tab><tab><tab><tab>More eeeeeeggs, more!<tab><tab>Eeeggs!<tab>
target:
エゴ、エゴ、エゴル、エゴロロロォ～ッ♪
タマゴ、チョウダイ、エッゴロロ～♪<tab><tab><tab><tab>アリガト、アリガト、エッゴロロ～♪
デモデモ、モット、タマゴ、ホシイ♪<tab><tab>エグゥ……。<tab>

source: Sooo many eeeggs! Shiiiny eeeggs! Sooo luckyyy!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
タマゴ、タクサン♪
エゴ、エゴ、エゴル、エゴロロロォ～ッ♪<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: It was all going swimmingly until the smell of fresh mochi attracted the hungry birds. Even the earth-shattering blows from the cyclops's mallet have done little to repel them!<tab>Surely someone as nimble as you will be able to avoid the titan's hammer and fetch what is left inside the mortars. Please hand any advent cakes you manage to rescue over to Jiromaru.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
怪力のサイクロプスを連れてきて、
餅をつかせるまでは良かったんだが……。
どこからともなく「鳥」が押し寄せてきて、えれぇ騒ぎなんだ！<tab>どうにかして「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収してくれねぇか！？
持ってきた餅は「ジロウマル」に渡してくれ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
It was all going swimmingly until the smell of fresh mochi attracted the hungry birds. Even the earth-shattering blows from the cyclops's mallet have done little to repel them!<tab>Surely someone as nimble as you will be able to avoid the titan's hammer and fetch what is left inside the mortars. Please hand any advent cakes you manage to rescue over to Jiromaru.<tab>Assist with retrieving the mochi?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>Ah, so you will not aid us then? I fully understand. Darting in to grab mochi whilst avoiding being pounded or pecked to death is indeed a challenge far too great for even the most daring adventurers to take on.<tab>
target:
怪力のサイクロプスを連れてきて、
餅をつかせるまでは良かったんだが……。
どこからともなく「鳥」が押し寄せてきて、えれぇ騒ぎなんだ！<tab>どうにかして「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収してくれねぇか！？
持ってきた餅は「ジロウマル」に渡してくれ！<tab>手伝いますか？

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※このF.A.T.E.の推奨レベルは<var 20 E802 /var>です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>そ、そうか……。
確かにあの「鳥」の大群を見たら、
尻込みするのも無理はねぇよな……。<tab>

source: Ook!?<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ook ook!<tab><tab>...Ook.<tab>
target: ウキー！？<tab><tab><tab><tab>ウッキキー！<tab><tab>……ウキー。<tab>

source: You say there appears to be a few handfuls' worth nestled at the bottom? Do you think could go back and scoop out what's remaining? We need as much mochi as we can get if we're to feed the hungry masses!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
多くの「降神餅」が集まったぜ！
けど、振る舞う餅は、多ければ多いほど良いもんだ！
よかったら、もっと回収してきてくれよな！？<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ook ook!<tab><tab><tab><tab>Ook ook ook!<tab><tab>Ook! Ook ook!<tab>
target: ウキキー！<tab><tab><tab><tab>ウキキッキー！<tab><tab>ウキー！　ウキッキー！<tab>

target: キキー！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: All was proceeding well until the accursed Rabid Wives came and unleashed their deckhounds. Battle-trained as they are, the cyclops's mighty pounding does naught to deter them.<tab>You must find a way to reach the mortar and retrieve the mochi, taking care to avoid maw and mallet both. What you are able to procure, you may leave in Taro's safekeeping.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
サイクロプスに餅をつかせるまでは良かったんだが……。
狂犬一家を名乗る海賊が、軍用犬をけしかけてきて、
えれぇ騒ぎなんだ！<tab>どうにかして「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収してくれねぇか！？
持ってきた餅は「タロ」に渡してくれ！<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
All was proceeding well until the accursed Rabid Wives came and unleashed their deckhounds. Battle-trained as they are, the cyclops's mighty pounding does naught to deter them.<tab>You must find a way to reach the mortar and retrieve the mochi, taking care to avoid maw and mallet both. What you are able to procure, you may leave in Taro's safekeeping.<tab>Assist with retrieving the mochi?

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The recommended level for this FATE is <var 20 E802 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab><tab><tab>Is that so... I'll not hide my disappointment, but nor can I blame you. The sight of those slavering beasts is enough to send even hardened mochi-retrievers fleeing with their tails between their legs.<tab>
target:
サイクロプスに餅をつかせるまでは良かったんだが……。
狂犬一家を名乗る海賊が、軍用犬をけしかけてきて、
えれぇ騒ぎなんだ！<tab>どうにかして「降神祭の臼」まで近づいて、
つきたての「降神餅」を回収してくれねぇか！？
持ってきた餅は「タロ」に渡してくれ！<tab>手伝いますか？
